isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - INSTALL - Install DRIVER AND PASSENGER SEATS

svcproc.title: Install DRIVER AND PASSENGER SEATS
svcproc.para: Individual air suspension driver and passenger seats, and mechanical passenger seats are available on this cab (Figure 29) and (Figure 30) , with additional seat options available for driver. Both driver and passenger seats provide many seat and back rest adjustments to assure a comfortable ride.
Refer to seat manufacturer's information for additional seat specific details.
See base plate mounting details (Items 5 thru 9, Figure 29) for various driver seat types.

note.para: Clean seat suspension and adjusters as required by wiping away any grease or dirt with shop towel. Apply a light coat of multipurpose lube to pivot points, sliding areas and rollers to assure a smooth operation on reinstallation. Wipe away excess lube.

step1.para: Install driver seat assembly (Item 1, Figure 29) and secure seat pedestal to floor with 4 seat mounting bolts (Item 3, Figure 29) . Tighten to 23 to 27 Lbf-ft (31 to 37 N•m).
Install passenger seat assembly (Item 1, Figure 30) and secure seat frame with 4 mounting bolts (Items 2 and 3, Figure 30) . Tighten to 23 to 27 Lbf-ft (31 to 37 N•m).
Install seat belt brackets (Item 4, Figure 32) to each side of seat and install 2 mounting bolts each side. Tighten to 25 to 35 Lbf-ft (34 to 47 N•m).
Connect air lines, if so equipped. Make sure air lines do not rub suspension parts.
Check for air line leaks, if so equipped, and check seat operation.
